dcterms:creator: G. B. Huang
M. Ramesh
T. Berg
E. Learned-Miller
dcterms:description: The LFW dataset consists of 13,233 face images of 5,749 individuals, which were collected from the web. There are 1,680 individuals who have two or more images. A 3D aligned version of LFW is used in our experiments.
dcterms:title: LFW dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Gross
I. Matthews
J. Cohn
T. Kanade
S. Baker
dcterms:description: The CMU Multi-PIE face dataset contains more than 750,000 images of 337 subjects recorded in four sessions. We select a subset of the 01 session that contains frontal and slightly non-frontal face images with all the available expressions and illumination conditions in our experiments.
dcterms:title: CMU Multi-PIE dataset
